channel.title: RedisGears release notes on Redis Documentation Center
channel.description: Recent content in RedisGears release notes on Redis Documentation Center

item.title: RedisGears 1.2 release notes
item.description: Requirements RedisGears v1.2.5 requires: Minimum Redis compatibility version (database): 6.0.0 Minimum Redis Enterprise Software version (cluster): 6.0.12 v1.2.5 (July 2022) This is a maintenance release for RedisGears 1.2. Update urgency: MODERATE : Program an upgrade of the server, but it’s not urgent. Details: Bug fixes: #792, #798 Execution was triggered infinitely when trimming is turned off. #791, #796 Stop triggering executions during pause even on failure. #794, #797 Use PythonInstallationDir configuration to find the virtual environment location on Redis Enterprise.

item.title: RedisGears 1.0 release notes
item.description: Here’s what’s changed recently in RedisGears. To learn more, see the linked pull requests. Requirements RedisGears v1.0.9 requires: Minimum Redis compatibility version (database): 6.0.0 Minimum Redis Enterprise Software version (cluster): 6.0.0 v1.0.9 (January 2022) This is a maintenance release for RedisGears 1.0 Update urgency: LOW : No need to upgrade unless there are new features you want to use. Details: Improvements: #652 Support for keys space notifications coming from other modules.
